title: KLEOKHAREIA
content:
KLEOKHAREIA (Cleochareia) was a Naiad-nymph of the river Eurotas in Lakonia (southern Greece). She was the wife
        of Lelex, the region's first earth-born king.

Probably a daughter of OKEANOS or the River EUROTAS (assuming her son merely gave his name to the stream)

Pseudo-Apollodorus, Bibliotheca 3. 116 (trans. Aldrich) (Greek mythographer C2nd
          A.D.) :
        "Eurotas a son of autochthonous Lelex and a Naias Nymphe (Naiad Nymph) named Kleokhareia
        (Cleochareia)."

A complete bibliography of the translations quoted on this page.
